snippet.title: Practical Joke T.p. Fondant April Fool's Cake
snippet.description: Sometimes you just come across a person who totally freakin deserves it. It's cheap and doesn't require much labor either...and it's just...

snippet.title: April Fools' Day Cauliflower Milkshake
snippet.description: Delicious and creamy. Serve in heatproof glasses with parfait spoons :) Recipe from the Canadian Living Web Site

snippet.title: April Fools' Day Fooled Ya French Fries
snippet.description: Found this fun kids idea in the April 2006 Parents magazine. See my Fooled Ya Hot Dog recipe and serve them both together! Great April Fools joke to play...

snippet.title: April Fools' Day Berry Sodas
snippet.description: I am going to make these and try to trick my kids for April Fool's Day. Found this in TOH Quick Cook. It looks like a drink that can be sipped with...

snippet.title: April Fools' Day Jiggly 'juice'
snippet.description: You'll need a spoon for this deceptive drink! Note that this only makes enough for 2 "drinks."

snippet.title: Berry Pie (For April Fools' Day )
snippet.description: I made this pie for a boy friend long ago & for my husband. I wish I could have had a photo of their faces. They didn't want me to know how "tough"...

snippet.title: April Fools' Day Grilled Cheese
snippet.description: You won't have to say "cheese" to make your kids smile once they sample this lunch look-alike.

snippet.title: April Fools' Day Fooled Ya Hot Dog in a Bun
snippet.description: Found this fun kids idea in the April 2006 Parents magazine. See my Fooled Ya French Fry recipe and serve them both together! Great April Fool's joke...

snippet.title: Happy April Fool’s Day – Burmese Mochi
snippet.description: Welcome to the month of April. It is one of my favorite months. Spring is finally here and in Northern California the rain is on its way out. April...
